ack.title: Acknowledgments
ack.p: We thank the staff of the Chest Medical Unit of Sanpya Hospital, Respiratory Medicine Department of Yangon General Hospital, and Department of Medical Research for sample collection; Akemi Watanabe for excellent technical support; and Akinori Miyashita and Ryozo Kuwano for support with DNA sequencing.
This work was supported by the Special Coordination Funds for Promoting Science and Technology of the Ministry of Education, Culture, Sports, Science and Technology, Japan.
